i.name: Sunlight
i.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

q.name: Shield of Daybreak
q.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

w.name: Eclipse
w.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

e.name: Zenith Blade
e.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.

r.name: Solar Flare
r.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.

i1.blurb: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Leona's''' abilities mark enemies hit with ''Sunlight'' for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

Any damage dealt by allies (other than herself) consumes ''Sunlight'', dealing {{tip|magic damage|icononly=true}} {{as|{{pp|25 to 144}}|magic damage}}{{tip|magic damage|noimg=true|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
i1.name: Sunlight
notes: * ''Sunlight's'' mark damage is credited to the allied champion and not to '''Leona'''.
** The damage will benefit from allies' magic penetration and will apply any spell effects they have (including {{sti|spell vamp}})
* Each ''Sunlight'' application does not stack and simply refreshes the debuff's timer.

riot.name: Sunlight
riot.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

riot.name: Shield of Daybreak
riot.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
riot.tooltip: Next basic attack deals {{ e2 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> bonus magic damage and stuns for {{ e1 }} second.

q1.blurb: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona's''' next [[basic attack]] gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} her target for 1 second.
''Shield of Daybreak'' resets '''Leona's''' basic attack timer.
q1.name: Shield of Daybreak
notes: * ''Shield of Daybreak'' will cause {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}} damage to trigger twice with a single basic attack.
* The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Shield of Daybreak's'' bonus damage.
** ''Shield of Daybreak's'' bonus damage will affect towers, but not inhibitors or the Nexus.

riot.name: Eclipse
riot.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
riot.tooltip: Grants {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus Armor and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

w1.blurb: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' raises her shield, gaining {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} for 3 seconds.
She then deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and retains ''Eclipse's'' '''bonus''' resistances for an additional 3 seconds if she damages an enemy.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Armor|{{ap|25|35|45|55|65}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' armor)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Resistance|{{ap|20|30|40|50|60}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
w1.name: Eclipse
notes: * ''Eclipse'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Leona's'' previous orders, unless she is in the beginning of an auto-attack, in which case the attack itself and its animation will get canceled.
* ''Eclipse's'' bonus resistance do not factor in themselves.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability but the buff's extended duration will not be prevented.

riot.name: Zenith Blade
riot.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
riot.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.

e1.blurb: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' projects a solar image of her sword, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck.
If she damages an enemy champion, she will {{tip|dash}} to the last one struck and {{tip|root|root}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
e1.name: Zenith Blade
notes: * ''Leona'' will automatically attempt to attack the target she dashes to.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but not the dash if being the last target hit.

riot.name: Solar Flare
riot.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
riot.tooltip:
Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

Leona's sword remains charged with Incandescence, causing her next {{ e5 }} basic attacks to gain 100 range and deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage on hit.

r1.blurb: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Leona''' calls down a beam of solar energy to the target location after a {{fd|0.625}} second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies it hits and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Enemies hit by the flare's center are instead {{tip|stun|stunned}} for the same duration.
Casting ''Solar Flare'' empowers '''Leona's''' next [[basic attack]]s with ''Incandescence'', gaining {{sti|range|100 '''bonus''' range}} and dealing {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|30|40|50}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Enhanced Basic Attacks|{{ap|3|4|5}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|90|160|250}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45|60|75}}% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Solar Flare
notes: * '''Solar Flare''' grants {{tip|sight}} in a 350 radius for the duration.
* Casting it to a location the enemy has no vision of (i.e [[bush]]) will not show any visual effect, but enemies around the area will still be affected.
* ''Incandescence's'' stacks fall off all at once, but the duration refreshes if Leona attacks an enemy.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability's initial cast and the on-hit damage from ''Incandescence''.
